Beginner Projects

Recursive Factorial

Implement a factorial function that relies on recursion.

File IO

Read binary data and format it nicely into a CSV for human readability.

Class Structured Inventory System

Create an inventory system based on multiple class structures.

Sorting Algorithms

Implement sorting algorithms of such as bubble sort, merge sort, and selection sort.

Binary Search

given a range from 1-100, create a higher/lower game in the command line that guesses the number the user is thinking of.

Dataset Analysis

perform statistical analysis on a csv dataset. create density graphs and boxplots
